Translations.Text: Nabhomandala o bhu-mandalera rajatba allahara'i. Yedina keyamata sanghatita habe, sedina mithyapanthira ksatigrasta habe.
Apani pratyeka um'matake dekhabena natajanu abasthaya. Pratyeka um'matake tadera amalanama dekhate bala habe. Tomara ya karate, adya tomaraderake tara pratiphala deya habe.
Amara kache raksita e'i amalanama tomadera samparke satya katha balabe. Tomara ya karate ami ta lipibad'dha karatama.
Yara bisbasa sthapana kareche o satkarma kareche, taderake tadera palanakarta sbiya rahamate dakhila karabena. Eta'i prakasya saphalya.
Ara yara kuphara kareche, taderake jijnasa kara habe, tomadera kache ki ayatasamuha pathita hata na? Kintu tomara ahankara karachile ebam tomara chile eka aparadhi sampradaya.
Yakhana bala hata, allahara oyada satya ebam keyamate kona sandeha ne'i, takhana tomara balate amara jani na keyamata ki? Amara kebala dharana'i kari ebam e bisaye amara niscita na'i.
Tadera manda karma gulo tadera samane prakasa haye parabe ebam ye ayaba niye tara thatta-bidrupa karata, ta taderake grasa karabe.
Bala habe, aja ami tomaderake bhule yaba, yemana tomara e dinera saksatke bhule giyechile. Tomadera abasasthala jahannama ebam tomadera sahayyakari ne'i.

Eta ejan'ye ye, tomara allahara ayatasamuhake thattarupe grahana karechile ebam parthiba jibana tomaderake pratarita karechila. Sutaram aja taderake jahannama theke bera kara habe na ebam tadera kache ta'oba ca'oya habe na.
Ata'eba, bisbajagatera palanakarta, bhu-mandalera palanakarta o nabhomandalera palanakarta allahara-i prasansa.
Nabhomandale o bhu-mandale tamra'i gauraba. Tini parakramasali, prajnamaya.
